sourcesContent:
import { Schema, model } from 'mongoose';
import mongoosePaginate from 'mongoose-paginate';
let users = Schema({
    userId:{ type: String, trim: true },
    firstName: { type: String, trim: true },
    lastName: { type: String, trim: true },
    email: { type: String, trim: true, lowercase: true, unique: true, required: 'Email address is required'},
    password: { type: String, required: 'Password is required.', trim: true },
    gender: { type: Boolean, trim: true },
    dob: { type: Date, trim: true },
    organization: {type: String, trim: true},
    phoneNumber: { type: Number, trim: true },
    addressOne: { type: String, trim: true },
    addressTwo: { type: String, trim: true },
    country: { type: String, trim: true },
    state: { type: String, trim: true },
    city: { type: String, trim: true },
    zipcode: { type: String, trim: true },
    roleId: { type: String, trim: true },
    validateToken: { type: String, trim: true },
    status: { type: Boolean, default: true },
    emailVerified: { type: Boolean, default: false },
    profilePicture:{type: String, trim:true},
}, { timestamps: true })
//User.plugin(mongoosePaginate);
export default model('users', users, 'users');

import { Schema, model } from 'mongoose';
import mongoosePaginate from 'mongoose-paginate';
let vendor = Schema({
    userId: { type: String, trim: true },
    firstName: { type: String, trim: true },
    lastName: { type: String, trim: true },
    email: { type: String, trim: true, lowercase: true, unique: true, required: 'Email address is required'},
    password: { type: String, required: 'Password is required.', trim: true },
    phoneNumber: { type: Number, trim: true },
    storeName:{type: String, trim:true},
    addressOne: { type: String, trim: true },
    addressTwo: { type: String, trim: true },
    countryId: { type: Number, trim: true },
    stateId: { type: Number, trim: true },
    cityId: { type: Number, trim: true },
    zipcode: { type: String, trim: true },
   validateToken: { type: String, trim: true },
   status: { type: Boolean, default: true },
   softDelete: { type: Boolean, default: false },
   emailVerified: { type: Boolean, default: false },
   profilePicture:{type: String, trim:true},
   createdBy:{type: Schema.Types.ObjectId, trim:true},
}, { timestamps: true })
//User.plugin(mongoosePaginate);
export default model('vendor', vendor, 'vendor');

{\"sourceRoot\":\"/home/anand/Desktop/pa.code:
"use strict";

Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", {
  value: true
});
exports.responseHandler = responseHandler;

function responseHandler(res, code, message, data) {
  return res.status(code).send({
    "code": code,
    "message": message,
    "data": data
  });
}
/***************************************************************************************************
                                   Standard ResPonse Code
****************************************************************************************************
200 - OK
201 - Created [ The request has been fulfilled, resulting in the creation of a new resource]
204 - No Content [ The server successfully processed the request and is not returning any content]
400 - Bad Request [If request not fullfill require data]
401 - Unauthorized [When token missing from header or invalid ]
403 - Forbidden  [ The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort.]
404 - Not Found  [ The requested resource could not be found but may be available in the future. Subsequent requests by the client are permissible.]
406 - Not Acceptable
408 - Request Timeout
440 - Session Expired
500 - Internal Server Error

***************************************************************************************************
                                        User Custom Response Code
***************************************************************************************************

1) 460 -469
 a) 460 - Please Verify New Ip after login again
 b) 461 - Please Verify Your Mail.
 c) 462 - Please Try After Ten Minutes.

2) 470 - 479
a) 470 - Your Otp has been Expire.
b)

3) 480 -489
a) 480 - Invalid 2FA SmsAuth Token / Invalid OTP
b) 481 - Invalid 2FA GAuth Token
c)

4) 490 - 499
a) 490 - Your Link has been Expired.
b) 491 - Invalid Email Link.
c)

******************************************************************************************************
                             Admin Custom Code
******************************************************************************************************

*/
//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;charset=utf-8;base64,

sourcesContent:
export function responseHandler(res, code, message, data) {
    return res.status(code).send({ "code": code, "message": message, "data": data });
}

/***************************************************************************************************
                                   Standard ResPonse Code
****************************************************************************************************
200 - OK
201 - Created [ The request has been fulfilled, resulting in the creation of a new resource]
204 - No Content [ The server successfully processed the request and is not returning any content]
400 - Bad Request [If request not fullfill require data]
401 - Unauthorized [When token missing from header or invalid ]
403 - Forbidden  [ The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort.]
404 - Not Found  [ The requested resource could not be found but may be available in the future. Subsequent requests by the client are permissible.]
406 - Not Acceptable
408 - Request Timeout
440 - Session Expired
500 - Internal Server Error

***************************************************************************************************
                                        User Custom Response Code
***************************************************************************************************

1) 460 -469
 a) 460 - Please Verify New Ip after login again
 b) 461 - Please Verify Your Mail.
 c) 462 - Please Try After Ten Minutes.

2) 470 - 479
a) 470 - Your Otp has been Expire.
b)

3) 480 -489
a) 480 - Invalid 2FA SmsAuth Token / Invalid OTP
b) 481 - Invalid 2FA GAuth Token
c)

4) 490 - 499
a) 490 - Your Link has been Expired.
b) 491 - Invalid Email Link.
c)

******************************************************************************************************
                             Admin Custom Code
******************************************************************************************************

*/

import { Schema, model } from 'mongoose';
import mongoosePaginate from 'mongoose-paginate';
let permission = Schema({
    userId: { type: Schema.Types.ObjectId, trim: true },
    roleName: {type: String, trim: true},
    dashboard: {view : Boolean},
    product:{view: Boolean, approve: Boolean},
    order: {view: Boolean, status: Boolean},
    role: {create: Boolean ,view: Boolean, edit: Boolean},
    transaction: {view: Boolean},
    customer: {create: Boolean, edit: Boolean, view: Boolean, delete: Boolean},
    vendor: {create: Boolean, edit: Boolean, view: Boolean, delete: Boolean},
    user: {create: Boolean, edit: Boolean, view: Boolean, delete: Boolean},
    feedback: { edit: Boolean, create: Boolean, view: Boolean, report: Boolean},
    emailCampaign: {view : Boolean},
    smsCampaign: {view : Boolean},
    createdBy:{type: Schema.Types.ObjectId, trim:true},
    status: { type: Boolean, default: true },
    softDelete: { type: Boolean, default: true },
}, { timestamps: true })
export default model('permission', permission, 'permission');

import { Schema, model } from 'mongoose';
import mongoosePaginate from 'mongoose-paginate';
let product = Schema({ 
    countId:{ type: String, trim: true },   
    categoryId:{ type: Schema.Types.ObjectId, trim: true },
    title: { type: String, trim: true },
    price: { type: Number, trim: true },
    discount: { type: Number, trim: true},
    discountStartDate: { type: Date, trim: true },
    discountEndDate: { type: Date, trim: true },    
    availableStock: { type: Number, trim: true },
    returnAllowed: { type: Boolean, default: false },
    cancelattionAllowed: { type: Boolean, default: false },
    planDelivery: { type: Boolean, trim: true },
    productDescription: { type: String, trim: true },
    productImage: {type: String, trim: true },
    createdBy: { type: Schema.Types.ObjectId, trim: true },
    updatedBy: { type: Schema.Types.ObjectId, trim: true },
    approvedBy: { type: Schema.Types.ObjectId, trim: true },
    featured: { type: Boolean, default: false },
    newArrival:{type: Boolean, default: false},
    status: { type: Boolean, default: true },
    isActive:{ type: Boolean, default: false },
    softDelete: { type: Boolean, default: false },
}, { timestamps: true })
//User.plugin(mongoosePaginate);
export default model('product', product, 'product');

import {
  login,
  verifyLink,
  auth,
  dashboard,
  logout,
  forgot,
  forgotValidation,
  resetPasswordLink,
  resetPassword,
  resetPasswordVerify,
  test
} from '../../webControllers/user/AuthController'
import {
  customerIndex,
  priceChangeCustomer,
  exportCustomerData,
  customerGetSubproductSize,
  customerGetSubproductSizeOrder,
  updateProductFabCost,
  toggleCustomer,
  exportOrderData,
  updateRateCustomer,
  updateCustomerDetail,
  productFabCost,
  customerShow,
  createCustomer,
  customerProfile,
  customerEdit,
  deleteCustomer,
  state,
  city,
  customerStore,
  updateCustomer
} from '../../webControllers/customers/customerController'
import {
  inventoryIndex,
  product,
  exportInventoryData,
} from '../../webControllers/inventory/inventoryController'
import {
  employeeIndex,
  employeeToggleStatus,
  exportUserData,
  employeeShow,
  employeeCreate,
  addEmployee,
  editEmployee,
  updateEmployee,
  deleteEmployee
} from '../../webControllers/user/employeeController'
import {
  orderIndex,
  orderShow,
  orderEdit,
  orderCreate,
  orderDetails,
  orderCancel
} from '../../webControllers/order/orderController'
import {
  productIndex,
  productShow,
  productEdit,
  productCreate,
  storeProduct,
  updateProduct,
  approveProduct,
  deleteProduct,
  productToggleStatus
} from '../../webControllers/product/productController'
import {
  vendorIndex,
  vendorProfile,
  vendorProfileEdit,
  vendorShow,
  vendorCreate,
  vendorStore,
  updateVendor,
  deleteVendor,
  vendorToggleStatus
} from '../../webControllers/vendor/vendorController'
import {
  reportIndex,
  inventoryList,
  reportShow,
  report,
  reportOrderFromToData,
  indexReport,
  reportExportOrderData
} from '../../webControllers/report/reportController'
import authMiddleware from '../../middleware/AuthMiddleware'
import {
  editUser,
  updateUser,
  changePassword,
  updatePassword,
  userProfile,
  usersEdit,
  userIndex
} from '../../webControllers/user/userController'
import {
  orderlistIndex,
  orderlistShow
} from '../../webControllers/itemlist/itemlistController'
import {
  roleIndex,
  roleCreate,
  roleEdit,
  roleShow,
  roleStore,
  roleUpdate
} from '../../webControllers/role/roleController'
import {
  categoryIndex,
  categoryCreate,
  categoryEdit,
  categoryShow,
  storeCategory,
  updateCategory,
  categoryToggleStatus,
  deleteCategory
} from '../../webControllers/category/categoryController'
import {
  promoIndex,
  promoCreate,
  promoEdit
} from '../../webControllers/promocode/promocodeController'
import {
  feedbackCreate,
  feedbackIndex,
  feedbackquestiondetails,
  feedbackQuestionEdit,
  feedbackQuestionShow
} from '../../webControllers/feedBack/feedbackController'

import { useProfile } from '../../webControllers/dummy/dummyController'
module.exports = (app) => {
  /** **********************************  Authantication Routes ***********************************************************/

  app.use(function (req, res, next) {
    res.header('Access-Control-Allow-Origin', '*')
    res.header(
      'Access-Control-Allow-Headers',
      'Origin, X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept'
    )
    next()
  })
  // app.get('/errors-404', handleErrors.errors_404);
  app.get('/login', login) // Login with get request
  app.get('/', login) // By-default Route forgotValidation
  app.post('/login', auth) // Login verify
  app.get('/logout', logout) // Logout route
  app.get('/forgot', forgot) // Logout route
  app.post('/forgot', forgotValidation) // Logout route
  app.get('/resetpassword', resetPassword) // reset password
  app.get('/resetpassword/:token', resetPasswordLink) // reset password
  app.post('/resetpassword/:token', resetPasswordVerify) // reset password
  app.get('/dashboard', authMiddleware, dashboard)
  app.get('/customer', authMiddleware, customerIndex)
  app.get('/customer/create', authMiddleware, createCustomer)
  app.get('/customer/show/:id', authMiddleware, customerShow)
  app.get('/customer/customer-profile/:id', authMiddleware, customerProfile)
  //app.post('/customer/toggle/:id', authMiddleware, toggleCustomer)
  app.get('/employee', authMiddleware, employeeIndex)
  app.get('/employee/create', authMiddleware, employeeCreate)
  app.get('/employee/show/:id', authMiddleware, employeeShow)
  app.post('/employee/toggle/:id', authMiddleware, employeeToggleStatus)

  //	app.post('/users/update/:id', AdminMiddleware, user.update);
  app.post('/employee/store', authMiddleware, addEmployee)
  app.get('/employee/edit/:id', authMiddleware, editEmployee)
  app.post('/employee/update/:id', authMiddleware, updateEmployee)
  app.get('/employee/export', authMiddleware, exportUserData)
  app.post('/employee/delete/:id', authMiddleware, deleteEmployee);

  /* ------------------ order router --------------------------------------- */

  app.get('/order', orderIndex)
  app.get('/order/show', orderShow)
  app.get('/order/edit', orderEdit)
  app.get('/order/create', orderCreate)
  app.get('/order/order-cancel', orderCancel)
  app.get('/order/details', orderDetails)

  /* ------------------ Product router --------------------------------------- */

  app.get('/product', authMiddleware, productIndex)
  app.get('/product/show/:id', authMiddleware, productShow)
  app.get('/product/edit/:id', authMiddleware, productEdit)
  app.get('/product/create', authMiddleware, productCreate)
  app.post('/product/store', authMiddleware, storeProduct)
  app.post('/product/update/:id', authMiddleware, updateProduct)
  app.post('/product/approve/:id', authMiddleware, approveProduct)
  app.post('/product/delete/:id', authMiddleware, deleteProduct);
  app.post('/product/toggle/:id', authMiddleware, productToggleStatus)
  // ------------------------ Roll Router -------------------

  app.get('/role', authMiddleware, roleIndex)
  app.get('/role/edit/:id', authMiddleware, roleEdit)
  app.get('/role/create', authMiddleware, roleCreate)
  app.get('/role/show', authMiddleware, roleShow)
  app.post('/role/store', authMiddleware, roleStore)
  app.post('/role/update/:id', authMiddleware, roleUpdate)

  // ------------------------ category Router -------------------

  app.get('/category', authMiddleware, categoryIndex)
  app.get('/category/edit/:id', authMiddleware, categoryEdit)
  app.get('/category/create', authMiddleware, categoryCreate)
  app.get('/category/show', authMiddleware, categoryShow)
  app.post('/category/store', authMiddleware, storeCategory)
  app.post('/category/update/:id', authMiddleware, updateCategory)
  app.post('/category/delete/:id', authMiddleware, deleteCategory);
  app.post('/category/toggle/:id', authMiddleware, categoryToggleStatus)

  /* ------------------ vendor router --------------------------------------- */

  app.get('/vendor/vendor-profile/:id', authMiddleware, vendorProfile)
  app.get('/vendor/edit/:id', authMiddleware, vendorProfileEdit)
  app.post('/vendor/store', vendorStore)
  app.get('/vendor', authMiddleware, vendorIndex)
  app.get('/vendor/create', authMiddleware, vendorCreate)
  app.post('/vendor/update/:id', authMiddleware, updateVendor)
  app.post('/vendor/delete/:id', authMiddleware, deleteVendor);
  app.post('/vendor/toggle/:id', authMiddleware, vendorToggleStatus)

  app.get('/inventory', authMiddleware, inventoryIndex)
  // app.post('/order/searchProduct', authMiddleware, searchProduct);
  app.get('/customer/export', authMiddleware, exportCustomerData)
  app.get('/customer/state/:id', authMiddleware, state)
  app.get('/customer/city/:id', authMiddleware, city)
  app.post('/customer/store', authMiddleware, customerStore)
  app.get('/customer/edit/:id', authMiddleware, customerEdit)
  //app.post('/customer/update/:id', authMiddleware, updateCustomer)
  app.post('/customer/updateCustomerDetail/:id', authMiddleware, updateCustomerDetail)
  app.post('/customer/toggle/:id', authMiddleware, toggleCustomer)
  app.post('/customer/delete/:id', authMiddleware, deleteCustomer)
  // app.get('/users/show', authMiddleware, showUser);
  app.get('/users/user-edit/:id', editUser)
  app.get('/users/user-profile/:id', authMiddleware, userProfile)
  app.get('/users/change-password', authMiddleware, changePassword)
  app.post('/user/update', authMiddleware, updateUser)
  app.post('/users/update-password', authMiddleware, updatePassword)
  app.get('/users/user-edit', usersEdit)
  app.get('/users/', userIndex)
  app.get('/verify/:token', verifyLink)
  app.get('/report', authMiddleware, reportIndex)
  app.post('/report/exportOrderDataList', authMiddleware, reportExportOrderData)
  app.get('/report/show/:id', authMiddleware, reportShow)
  app.get('/itemlist', authMiddleware, orderlistIndex)
  app.get('/itemlist/show/:id', authMiddleware, orderlistShow)
  app.get('/inventory-list', authMiddleware, inventoryList)
  app.get('/test', test)
  // Dumy pages
  app.get('/dummy/user-profile', useProfile)
  // ------------------------ PromoCode Router -------------------

  app.get('/promocode', promoIndex)
  app.get('/promocode/edit', promoEdit)
  app.get('/promocode/create', promoCreate)

  // -------------------------Feedback -------
  app.get('/feedback', feedbackIndex)
  app.get('/feedback/show', feedbackQuestionShow)
  app.get('/feedback/edit', feedbackQuestionEdit)
  app.get('/feedback/create', feedbackCreate)
  app.get('/feedback/feedback-details', feedbackquestiondetails)

  //     app.use(function(req,res){
  //     res.status(404).render('errors/404.pug')});
  //     app.use(function(req,res){
  //     res.status(500).render('errors/404.pug')});
  // }
}

import { Schema, model } from 'mongoose';
import mongoosePaginate from 'mongoose-paginate';
let students = Schema({
    userId:{ type: String, trim: true },
    firstName: { type: String, trim: true },
    lastName: { type: String, trim: true },
    email: { type: String, trim: true, lowercase: true, unique: true, required: 'Email address is required'},
    password: { type: String, required: 'Password is required.', trim: true },
    gender: { type: Boolean, trim: true },
    dob: { type: Date, trim: true },
    classId: { type: Schema.Types.ObjectId, trim: true },
    fatherFirstName: {type: String, trim: true},
    fatherLastName: {type: String, trim: true},
    montherFirstName: {type: String, trim: true},
    montherLastName: {type: String, trim: true},
    fatherOccupation: {type: String, trim: true},
    motherOccupation: {type: String, trim: true},
    phoneNumber: { type: Number, trim: true },
    addressOne: { type: String, trim: true },
    addressTwo: { type: String, trim: true },
    country: { type: String, trim: true },
    state: { type: String, trim: true },
    city: { type: String, trim: true },
    zipcode: { type: String, trim: true },
    validateToken: { type: String, trim: true },
    status: { type: Boolean, default: true },
    emailVerified: { type: Boolean, default: false },
    profilePicture:{type: String, trim:true},
}, { timestamps: true })
//User.plugin(mongoosePaginate);
export default model('students', students, 'students');
